title: Amulet of avarice

properties.name: description
properties.value: The amulet of avarice is an amulet that can be received as a drop from revenants found within the Revenant Caves. The amulet has the same combat bonuses as the amulet of glory, but has an additional 20% increase in accuracy and damage when fighting revenants. The effects of the amulet do not stack with the Slayer helmet (i).

Item ID22557

The amulet of avarice is an amulet that can be received as a drop from revenants found within the Revenant Caves. The amulet has the same combat bonuses as the amulet of glory, but has an additional 20% increase in accuracy and damage when fighting revenants. The effects of the amulet do not stack with the Slayer helmet (i).

Equipping the amulet will cause the player to become skulled. Attempting to equip the amulet gives a warning telling the player that this will happen. The skull cannot be removed until the amulet is unequipped, after which it behaves like a normal PK skull and disappears after twenty minutes. In exchange, all drops received from NPCs within the Revenant Caves and Wilderness Slayer Cave while this amulet is worn will be in the form of bank notes. Items dropped from black dragons will not be noted.

If the amulet is worn while killing the Revenant maledictus as a top-damaging player, they will obtain the "Forinthry Surge" skull for 30 minutes, a variant that provides an additional 15% accuracy and damage boost when fighting revenants. Taking off the amulet will automatically remove this buff.

Concept art[edit | edit source]

  • The initial designs of the amulet of avarice by Mod West.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 March 2022
(update)

Entering and leaving The Gauntlet with an amulet of avarice equipped will no longer clear the player's skull.

16 December 2021
(update)

The amulet of avarice buff will now apply to the ornate Wilderness combat dummy.

3 November 2021
(update)

The amulet now increases accuracy and damage by 20% when fighting revenants.

11 November 2020
(update)

The amulet's effects will now work within the Wilderness Slayer Cave.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The amulet was suggested by Reddit user The_Vault_Hunteras part of a competition to design new rewards for the Revenant Caves.

[[File:Amulet of avarice detail.png|left|110px]]
The '''amulet of avarice''' is an [[amulet]] that can be received as a drop from [[revenants]] found within the [[Revenant Caves]]. The amulet has the same combat bonuses as the [[amulet of glory]], but has an additional 20% increase in accuracy and damage when fighting revenants. The effects of the amulet '''do not''' stack with the [[Slayer helmet (i)|Slayer helmet (i).]]

Equipping the amulet will cause the player to become [[Skull (status)|skulled]]. Attempting to equip the amulet gives a warning telling the player that this will happen. The skull cannot be removed until the amulet is unequipped, after which it behaves like a normal PK skull and disappears after twenty minutes. In exchange, all drops received from [[Non-player character|NPCs]] within the [[Revenant Caves]] and [[Wilderness Slayer Cave]] while this amulet is worn will be in the form of [[bank note]]s. Items dropped from black dragons will not be noted.

If the amulet is worn while killing the [[Revenant maledictus]] as a top-damaging player, they will obtain the "Forinthry Surge" skull for 30 minutes, a variant that provides an additional 15% accuracy and damage boost when fighting revenants. Taking off the amulet will automatically remove this buff.
